name: Necrotic Haze
description:
Embark on a thrilling co-op adventure in Necrotic Haze, where you and a friend will battle hordes of undead creatures while trying to find your way out of a perilous medieval night. Engage in intense combat, unravel mysteries, and survive the nightmarish landscape in this action-packed escape experience.

Key Features:

Cooperative Gameplay: Team up with a friend and face the undead together in adrenaline-pumping co-op battles. Coordinate your strategies, cover each other's backs, and overcome challenges as a united force.

Fight the Undead: Experience intense and visceral combat as you confront various types of undead creatures. Utilize a wide range of weapons, both ranged and melee, to defeat your enemies and survive the night.

Perilous Nighttime Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in the eerie and haunting medieval night setting, with rain pouring down, casting ominous shadows on the abandoned ruins. The atmospheric audio design enhances the sense of danger and desperation as you search for an escape route.

Engaging Puzzles and Exploration: Navigate through intricately designed environments, uncover hidden pathways, and solve puzzles to progress. Discover secret areas that can aid your escape.


Content:

Challenging Level: Journey through a variety of meticulously crafted levels, each with its own unique undead encounters, environmental hazards, and secrets to uncover that will be released with the upcoming updates
Co-op Missions: Engage in a series of co-op missions, each with its own objectives and challenges that will test your teamwork and strategic coordination.
Gameplay:
Undead Escape offers dynamic and fast-paced gameplay, combining strategic combat with exploration and puzzle-solving. Work together with your partner to defeat enemies, locate key items, and unlock new areas while constantly evading the relentless undead.
